vb12:12.5: muggasūpyatāya → muggasuppatāya (bj); muggasūpatāya (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | jaṅghapesanikena → jaṅghapesaniyena (bj)
vb12:25.2: majjhimayāmaṃ → majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | pāde pādaṃ → pādena pādaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb12:60.2: thiyanā thiyitattaṃ → thīyanā thīyitattaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb12:1.1: ti → ayaṃ pāṭho mātikāyaṃ natthi, niddese pana sabbapotthakesu
